MR No. 217 - Schools to Be Established; Be on God's Side

     How cruel it is to leave children to choose their own way, and to form a character without the direction of wise counsel!  Yet, from the light that I have, I know that many parents who claim to be Christians have neglected their duty for so long a time that not a few of our young people have swung from the barriers of truth, and are in great danger of being swept downward to ruin by the temptations of the enemy.
